meanings.sent1: The ball was catchable by the player.
meanings.sent2: The butterfly was too catchable to escape.
meanings.sent3: The catchable fish seemed to be playing a game of tag.
meanings.sent4: The catchable opportunity slipped through his fingers.
meanings.sent5: The catchable snowflake landed softly on her glove.

meanings.sent1: The catchable rabbit hopped into the trap.
meanings.sent2: The catchable thief was apprehended by the police.
meanings.sent3: The catchable idea popped into her mind out of nowhere.
meanings.sent4: The catchable dream lingered just out of reach.
meanings.sent5: The catchable firefly glowed in the dark night.
